name: @magic-expo/navigation
description: Navigation presets for Magic Expo apps

scripts.build: bun run build:js && bun run build:types
scripts.build:js: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --format esm --external react --external react-native --external expo --external expo-router --external @react-navigation/native --external @react-navigation/bottom-tabs --external @react-navigation/drawer --external @react-navigation/stack --external react-native-gesture-handler --external react-native-reanimated --external react-native-safe-area-context --external react-native-screens
